ControlVM Technology provide comprehensive, wide range and affordable virtual private servers (VPS) hosting with well known virtualization technology such as OpenVZ, Xen, and KVM. No matter use for Enterprise shared / reseller hosting, telephony system such as Hosted PBX or VoIP VPS, VPN, intranet, Monitoring Server, DNS server, Simulation / Application server or Backup Server, we have the right solutions that suite your needs. Currently we are serving customers from more than 30 countries and managing servers in 6 data centers in 3 continents.
